title: ANTI-THEFT ALARM CIRCUIT USING A TOUCH SENSOR
description: A safety prototype that can be placed anywhere due to its minimalist size. Protect valuable items from unwanted things.

title: AUTOMATIC FISH FEEDER AND AQUARIUM MAINTENANCE TOOL
description: A fish feeder that can be timed using a keypad. Automatic water turbidity purifier in fish aquarium.

title: NOISE DETECTION PROTOTYPE IN LIBRARY
description: Prorotype of noise level detector in the library using buzzer as a warning sign to maintain order. The library is a special place that is used as a place to focus on finding new knowledge, looking for book references or even the most comfortable place when studying, so a tool is needed to maintain order and comfort for students in the library.

title: MONITORING THE CAPACITY OF MANUFACTURED ITEMS IN THE WAREHOUSE
description: A tool for monitoring warehouse capacity to maintain neatness in the arrangement of manufactured goods. With a neat placement of goods, it will maximize the function and effectiveness of warehouse storage capacity.

title: LINE FOLLOWER
description: A robot designed to follow the path of a predetermined line. The line here uses black color placed on a light colored surface. This robot uses an infrared sensor to detect the line and then drives the motor to walk along the path.
